address: Map of 62A Avenue Rd , Mosman, NSW, 2088, Australia
keywords: Yoga Australia, Bikram, Hatha, Iyengar, Ashtanga, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane
title: Adore Yoga on FindYoga
desc: Welcome to Adore Yoga PRIVATE CLASSES, SMALL GROUP CLASSES, MENTORING "I have really enjoyed your program, your teachers are absolutely special." Carissa, Adore Student.Our students say nice things about us because they love what we do. Adore Yoga in Mosman is not like other yoga places. You'll love visiting our studios because you'll feel welcome, comfortable and appreciated. It doesn't matter if you can't touch your toes (or even see them!) Our students come in all shapes, sizes and ages and we welcome everybody to our friendly, fun classes. Our classes are limited to 8 students or less so your teacher will know your name and help you to work at just the right level. No being stuck at the back wondering if you're doing it wrong or struggling to copy a super-flexible instructor going at break-neck speed. We'll give you the 1-on-1 instruction and support you need to reach your health goals.Our Guarantee - you will love your Adore Yoga course, or we'll refund your full course fees and even pay for you to attend a class at another yoga school*.Note: YOGA PASS studentsStudents using Yoga Pass must book their place at least 24 hours in advance. All places are subject to availability. *80% attendance required to qualify for course refund. Alternative class payment limited to single group class at a yoga studio within Mosman 2088 district.

address: Map of 29A Majors Bay Rd, Concord, NSW, 2137, Australia
keywords: Yoga Australia, Bikram, Hatha, Iyengar, Ashtanga, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane
title: Concord Yoga on FindYoga
desc: Ki Yoga is a dynamic yoga, which changes with each session to continually bring harmony and support within. Ki Yoga not only stretches and strengthens the physical body but also strengthens the meridians (energy pathways) of the body to improve wellbeing. The asanas (postures and stretches) are designed to stimulate these various meridian pathways to improve your strength, flexibility, coordination, and cardiovascular health as well as improve your sense of physical confidence and overall wellbeing. Ki Yoga is suitable for beginner and advanced students - call us on 02 8765 8526 to book a free introductory class.

title: essence of yoga on FindYoga
desc:
Essence of Yoga was founded in 2005 with the intention of providing the local community with a warm and welcoming studio and a high level of teaching to help students explore the essence of yoga in an authentic, safe, practical and supportive environment.
The yoga studio is fullyequipped with ropes, props and mats. Class sizes are limited to 11 students.This creates a strong sense of community and ensures that all participantsreceive individual attention and guidance. The studio offers ocean views and is located in beautiful surroundings.

address: Map of 1 Holtermann St, Crows Nest, NSW, 2065, Australia
keywords: Yoga Australia, Bikram, Hatha, Iyengar, Ashtanga, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane
title: Mantra Yoga on FindYoga
desc:
Mantra Yoga provides a space where students from all walks of life and all levels of fitness can move into greater health and inner harmony through practising hatha yoga postures. Classes are taught in a warm room to allow the body to open more deeply. Our basic series is designed to systematically cleanse, strengthen and heal your whole body. The sequence of postures builds your bone and muscle strength, your flexibility, works your cardiovascular and respiratory systems and calms your mind. We move progressively deeper into all the systems of the body with a focus on working the spine, the abdominal muscles, the digestive, reproductive and endocrine systems. Your body is brought into a state of potential healing and you leave class feeling energised and relaxed.Introductory Offer
5 Yoga

address: Map of 8 Melford St (entrance via Wattle Ln, rear of Uniting Church), Hurlstone Park, NSW, 2193, Australia
keywords: Yoga Australia, Bikram, Hatha, Iyengar, Ashtanga, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane
title: Art of Yoga on FindYoga
desc: Art of Yoga is a school of Hatha Yoga. Hatha yoga is comprised of asana (physical postures) and pranayama (the yoga of breathing).The purpose of the classes at Art of Yoga is to present the subject and practice of hatha yoga as clearly and as supportively as possible. Students are guided towards open hearted self enquiry and a balanced approach to working with mind and body.The School structure supports regular attendance, progressive learning, and an opportunity to learn how to practice through our Practice Programs system. The atmosphere created by regular attendance over a period of time becomes dynamic and supportive for all students.

address: Map of 930 Anzac Parade, Maroubra, NSW, 2035, Australia
keywords: Yoga Australia, Bikram, Hatha, Iyengar, Ashtanga, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane
title: Bikram - Maroubra  on FindYoga
desc: Each posture stretches and strengthens specific muscles, ligaments and joints needed for the next posture. The Bikram method also stimulates the organs, glands and nerves, moving fresh oxygenated blood to 100 percent of the body, restoring all systems to a healthy working order. Bikram scientifically designed this 90-minute program to deliver total health through the balancing and strengthening of every system in the body in order to prevent illness and injury, promote weight loss, and limit the effects of aging. In addition, the series of postures combine skills of concentration, patience, determination and self-control that increase mental clarity and reduce stress. Bikram yoga is done in a heated room to warm your muscles, prevent injury, allow a deeper workout and cleanse the body by flushing toxins.

address: Map of Level 1, 17 Bronte Rd (opening soon 2015), Bondi Junction, NSW, 2022, Australia
keywords: Yoga Australia, Bikram, Hatha, Iyengar, Ashtanga, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane
title: Yoga Synergy - Bondi Junction on FindYoga
desc: Simon Borg Olivier and Bianca Machliss have been friends and business partners since 1989, and established Yoga Synergy in the sincere hope of bringing more yoga to more people in a safe and nurturing environment. The aim of every practice at Yoga Synergy is to enhance one's life by nurturing and generating the internal fire and life force that keeps us alive. We welcome you to Yoga Synergy and look forward to meeting you. Yoga Synergy is a team of professional teachers, trained personally by Bianca and Simon, with years of experience teaching the Synergy style of yoga. Yoga Synergy was established in Newtown in 1984, and then in Bondi Junction in 1997, and Manly in 2002. This dynamic style of Hatha Yoga, devised by the directors, who are both qualified physiotherapists, Simon Borg-Olivier MSc BAppSc (Physiotherapy) MAPA

address: Map of 1st floor, 2h Gladstone St, corner of Wilford St just off Station St. off Enmore Road, Enmore, NSW, 2042, Australia
keywords: Yoga Australia, Bikram, Hatha, Iyengar, Ashtanga, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane
title: Black Lotus Studios on FindYoga
desc: Black Lotus Studios is a yoga and natural therapies centre in Enmore. At Black Lotus Studios we teach Iyengar yoga open classes, pre-enrol LEvel 2 intensives and beginners courses. Private and remedial sessions are available on request. We have classes for children and teenagers- "Yippee-i-yoga". Our Natural Therapies Centre has a wide range of practitioners and modalities - please go straight to the website for booking details. We are located on the edge of Newtown, just off Enmore Rd, close to buses and Newtown train station. The entrance is right on the corner of Gladstone and Wilford streets. The building is easy to find as it is covered in graffiti and right next to 'Ausscrap'. We are up the stairs and on the 1st floor. The studios are light and warm, with two large teaching rooms, and two more rooms that are perfect for remedial and therapeutic work. Sue-ellen Kohler, a teacher from the Sydney Yoga Space, which has now closed, is the director of Black Lotus Studios. She has been teaching since 1989 and was certified to teach Iyengar yoga in 1995. Her training was with Peter Thomson and she has regularly studied at the Iyengar Yoga Institute in Pune, India. Peter Thomson, the owner of The Sydney Yoga Space, teaches regular advanced intensives at Black Lotus Studios.

Therefore, medical classes are on offer as well as classes for advanced students and teachers.For those requiring more attention, private tuition is available by appointment.Classes at all levels are taught by highly qualified, and dedicated Iyengar Yoga Certified teachers. Principal teachers Henryk Liskiewicz (Senior Intermediate III),has been approved by B.K.S. Iyengar to conduct Teacher Training and Medical classes. Tamar Kelly and Robyn Adler are both certified at the Junior Intermediate II level and have been teaching for decades.

title: Hatha Yoga Sydney on FindYoga
desc: Hatha Yoga is a classical style of yoga designed to strengthen both the body and the mind. By working systematically through different sequences of asanas (postures) and observing correct physical alignment and coordination of the breath, then a more open and flexible body can be acquired as well as improved concentration, awareness and a reduction in stress levels and tension. All levels welcome. Bookings necessary.

address: Map of 1/141 Redfern St, Redfern, NSW, 2016, Australia

title: Redfern Yoga Room on FindYoga
desc:
Class Descriptions
ASHTANGA YOGA
Mysore style
A traditional style of yoga taught as a set sequence of Asanas (postures) synchronising the movement of the body with the breath. The Asanas are designed in a specific order to open, align and detoxify the body and nervous system. Developing greater physical strength, flexibility and mental clarity. Students are taught at their own pace in a small group setting and courses are suitable for all levels.
ASHTANGA Led/Beginners Courses.
Exactly as above although the group is guided together through an introduction to the Ashtanga series.
Private classes are also available.
The Redfern Yoga Room is available for hire by any person or group who wish to use it for peaceful purposes and practices.
Introductory Offer 3 Classes $30 (not for use in early morning Ashtanga Mysore classes)

Enjoy a space without fear or judgement.Here you can be motivated and start a journey. Disconnect from the world and reconnect with yourself.

title: Yoga Village in Potts Point on FindYoga
desc:
Yoga Village is a welcoming yoga space dedicated to the practice of Vinyasa, a flowing style of yoga linking the breath to movement in and out of sustained postures. In each class an experienced teacher will guide you through a dynamic sequence of asanas designed to challenge, energise and revitalise your body whilst quietening your mind. Classes are similar in format and style so you will feel a sense of improvement and progression with each class attended. While maintaining this familiarity and consistency, we will regularly introduce new and challenging postures to aid you in your development and expand your individual yoga practice.
Please check the website for class times, types and prices and feel free to contact us with any questions. www.yogavillage.com.au

address: Map of 18 Cooper St, Surry Hills, NSW, 2010, Australia
keywords: Yoga Australia, Bikram, Hatha, Iyengar, Ashtanga, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane
title: Central Yoga School on FindYoga
desc: The best thing about our school is the quality of our teaching. All teachers are Iyengar certified, have a thorough knowledge of yoga, and have been practising for a minimum of 10 years.The second best thing is the size of our classes. The average number of students per class is 8 - 12, so you will get a lot of attention and correction.Another important aspect of our school is its culture. The majority of the students who attend the school have been doing so over a long period of time. Because of this they have both an appreciation and dedication to the subject of yoga, and this energy pervades through the classes. We teach on-going Foundation (Level 1) to Experienced (Level 3) Classes. There is also the opportunity to participate in our regularly held workshops, intensives and retreats, and we also offer a Teacher Training program once a regular and consistent practice has been established. Most of our classes can be attended on a walk in basis, however we do have an online booking system which we appreciate people using. Please view our current timetable here.We also run an Introductory Course on the first weekend of each month from 11.30am - 1.30pm (Saturday

title: InYoga on FindYoga
desc: InYoga was created for people to connect with like-minded others, enriching their knowledge and experience of yoga both on and off the mat.An innovative approach to the traditional philosophy of yoga lies at the heart of all that we offer. Yoga is any activity or path that leads to integration or wholeness of the human being. We acknowledge the traditional lineages of yoga, presenting them in a way that is relevant to modern, city-dwelling yogis.Our vision is to guide you through an organic, evolutionary, living process of yoga to awaken your full potential. Through our classes, workshops, trainings and events, we encourage you to live, know and love a life in yoga.By practicing at InYoga you will also be contributing to the charities that we support

title: My Yoga Essence on FindYoga
desc: My Yoga Essence is located in a cosy, light-filled yoga studio in the heart of Ultimo, Sydney. A studio that caters for small group classes with an inviting atmosphere that allows for true one-on-one attention. We offer a diverse range of yoga classes, pilates, workshops and courses in natural room temperature, that will help students achieve a healthy, balanced mind and body. Our classes are designed to realign your body, tone and strengthen your physique and leave you with a calm mind. Our wellness approach is to empower the students to empower their own physical, mental and emotional transformation.We welcome all levels and background, whether you are just starting an exercise regimen to increase flexibility and build physical strength, seasonal yogis to improve mind-body awareness and spiritual growth or rehab from an injury. Our qualified teachers are passionate to provide you with a peaceful space that nurtures and support to ensure your yoga journey is safe and fun!We look forward to seeing you on the mat!

desc: The City Yoga Studio, established in 1997, offers gentle yet invigourating Shanti Yoga classes: classical hatha yoga. All classes are multi-level and cater equally to beginners as to those wishing to deepen their yoga practice. We offer one-hour sessions, MONDAY to THURSDAY, at lunchtime and after work in which we incorporate breath work, postures and relaxation. Mats, blankets, cushions, filtered water and air conditioning/heating are supplied... so just bring yourself. We also to provide one-on-one sessions and corporate Yoga.

desc: Hom Yoga was created to enable everyone to be able to practice yoga in the most clear and inspired way. We embrace all forms of practice in our unique and contemporary style. This is practiced in our specially designed studios in a hot environment.To achieve this, our teachers come from a broad range of yoga disciplines. Our classes are designed and presented in the clearest, most accessible way to cater to all levels of experience.Hom is renown for the design of all our studios and the high level of service from our welcome staff and facilities to our specialized teaching team. It is our belief that everyone should have a deep and uplifting experience each time they visit; and leave feeling light, confident, and inspired.Hom continues to expand and grow and explore ways to deepen everyone
